title: Rank Badge, 1644–1911
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads, coral beads
Technique: satin weave foundation with embroidery in satin stitch, couching and beading
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Mrs. Robert H. Patterson
description: Mandarin square for civil official of the second rank. A golden pheasant, embroidered on black, in flight and surrounded by cloud forms and symbols.  The two pieces, meant for the front of a coat, have been sewn together.

tombstone.epitaph:
Rank Badge, 1644–1911.
1644–1911. Medium: silk, metallic threads, coral beads
Technique: satin weave foundation with embroidery in satin stitch, couching and beading. Gift of the Estate of Mrs. Robert H. Patterson. 1941-31-43-a,b.
